examples: How should I take my medication?

responses: Aspirin is commonly used for pain relief and reducing inflammation. Do you have specific questions about it?
Ibuprofen is used to reduce fever and relieve pain. Always follow your doctor's instructions.
It's important to take your medication as prescribed. If you have questions, consult your pharmacist.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
